testcase.name: Get addresses data
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Get addresses data # src/test/resources/features/addresses.feature:3 Given Faker API is ready # stepdefinitions.CommonSteps.fakerApiReady() When I request addresses # stepdefinitions.AddressesSteps.requestAddresses() Then response status code should be 200 # stepdefinitions.CommonSteps.validateStatusCodeGeneric(int) And response data should not be empty # stepdefinitions.CommonSteps.validateDataNotEmpty()
